scripts.androiddev: rm -rf platforms/ && rm -rf plugins/ && rm -rf www/ && node prepare.js android dev && ionic cordova build android --configuration=dev --release --buildConfig build-android-dev.json
scripts.androidstaging: rm -rf platforms/ && rm -rf plugins/ && rm -rf www/ && node prepare.js android stg && ionic cordova build android --configuration=staging --release --buildConfig build-android-staging.json
scripts.androidprod: rm -rf platforms/ && rm -rf plugins/ && rm -rf www/ && node prepare.js android prod && ionic cordova build android --configuration=production --release --buildConfig build-android-prod.json
scripts.iosdev: rm -rf platforms/ && rm -rf plugins/ && rm -rf www/ && node prepare.js ios dev && ionic cordova build ios --device --configuration=dev --debug --buildConfig build-ios-dev.json
scripts.iosdevrelease: rm -rf platforms/ && rm -rf plugins/ && rm -rf www/ && node prepare.js ios dev && ionic cordova build ios --device --configuration=dev --release --buildConfig build-ios-dev.json
scripts.iosstaging: rm -rf platforms/ && rm -rf plugins/ && rm -rf www/ && node prepare.js ios stg && ionic cordova build ios --device --configuration=staging --debug --buildConfig build-ios-stg.json
scripts.iosstagingrelease: rm -rf platforms/ && rm -rf plugins/ && rm -rf www/ && node prepare.js ios stg && ionic cordova build ios --device --configuration=staging --release --buildConfig build-ios-stg.json
scripts.iosprod: rm -rf platforms/ && rm -rf plugins/ && rm -rf www/ && node prepare.js ios prod && ionic cordova build ios --device --configuration=production --debug --buildConfig build-ios-prod.json
scripts.iosprodrelease: rm -rf platforms/ && rm -rf plugins/ && rm -rf www/ && node prepare.js ios prod && ionic cordova build ios --device --configuration=production --release --buildConfig build-ios-prod.json
